ComicInfo.Title: The Laughing Man, Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC
“STATIONS OF THE CROSS,” Part One
The hottest series of 2018 returns from the creative team that BRIAN MICHAEL BENDIS said “will go down as one of the greatest comic teams of all time!”
After the mind-blowing events of the second arc, our story heads right through the looking glass back to Gideon Falls, 1886! Once there, a Father Burke must help catch a vicious killer named… Norton Sinclair? And when the killer can travel through time (and space), readers are in for a wild ride.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Andrea Sorrentino & Dave Stewart | 1 | | B | Cover B | Ming Doyle | 2 |
